sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SURVEY_ANS_EXAM ( SURVEY_ID , ANS_SEQ , QUEST_SEQ , EXAM_SEQ
, EXAM_VAL
, EXAM_ANS
) VALUES ( #surveyId# , #ansSeq# , #questSeq# , #examSeq#
, #examVal#
, (SELECT DECODE(TEMP, NULL, NULL, DECODE((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(QUEST_SEQ), 0, 'N', 'Y') PRSN_INFO_YN FROM TB_SURVEY_QUEST WHERE SURVEY_ID = #surveyId# AND QUEST_SEQ = #questSeq# AND PRSN_INFO_YN = 'Y' AND EXAM_CD = 'TEXT'), 'Y', #examAns#, #examAns#)) AS examAns FROM (SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(#examAns#),' ','') AS TEMP FROM DUAL ) )
)
